CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: When were each of the major scope changes identified and communicated?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Confirm you were SCC when Q-11876 was issued in June 2023.

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
As SCC, you were responsible for drafting and reviewing customer proposals.

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Confirm no specific factors tied to SN 5174 (e.g., prior corrosion) were analyzed or factored.

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Acknowledge these parts were not repaired at St. Louis but routed elsewhere.

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Confirm you were responsible for customer communications post-induction.

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Did you ensure consistent updates during holidays or when STMs were unavailable?

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Did you clarify to CITIOM which tasks were on hold for RRCC or Honeywell approval?

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
Were there efforts to fast-track pre-authorized tasks?

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
VII. You Were Aware of but Did Not Resolve Manpower Deficiencies

[4. Charles Philipp - Cross Exam & Impeachment .docx, p.1]
You were copied on discussions acknowledging inadequate labor and the need to reallocate resources.

[111-206.pdf, p.10]
4320 Green Street West Palm Beach, FL 33406

[111-206.pdf, p.34]
Reach out to the CPS team for the aircraft serial numbers.

[111-206.pdf, p.35]
doable. Send CPS the launch dates and duration for each team member. Ensure they leverage the loan in labor process.
